name: AMERICAN MEDICAL REHABILITATION PROVIDERS ASSOCIATION
description: Association of medical rehabilitation hospitals and providers
sampleDescriptions: Site neutral payment issues; implementation of the Continuing Care Hospital; medical necessity to post-acute care reform; therapy caps reauthorization/repeal; implementation of IMPACT Act of 2014 (P.L. 113-185); implementation of H.R. 2, Medicare Access and CHIP Reauthorization Act of 2015; Comprehensive Care for Joint Replacement (CCJR) Model; managed care related issues; value based purchasing issue, Recovery Audit Contractor issues, Balanced Budget Act of 2018.
